rules.rule_name: Accessory Structure in Required Rear Yard
source_section: Section A: Combo garage / small pool cabana (side by side)

Qualifiers.applicability: Structure is located in a required rear yard.
exclusions: Does not apply to structures located within the buildable area.
The 75' distance requirement has a special allowance for garages (see 'Special Allowance for Garages' rule).

dimensional.name: distance_from_front_lot_line
dimensional.description: Distance from the structure to the front lot line.

dimensional.name: location_relative_to_lot_line
dimensional.description: Position of the structure relative to a lot line.

material.name: wall_rating
material.description: Fire rating of the wall assembly.

material.name: roof_rating
material.description: Fire rating of the roof assembly.

usage.name: plumbing_fixture_count
usage.description: Number of plumbing fixtures in the structure.

mandatory: Must comply with accessory structure daylight plane.

conditional_logic.then: The wall on the lot line and the roof must be fire rated.

ambiguous_language.text: Structure has 3 plumbing fixtures... so it requires a CUP.
ambiguous_language.interpretation: Interpreted as a threshold of '>= 3' fixtures for requiring a CUP, as a rule applying only to exactly 3 fixtures is unlikely. The condition is combined with the area threshold.

Relationships.hierarchical: This rule is a primary regulation for accessory structures under the general title 'Accessory structures site planning'.
logical_dependencies: This rule is subject to modification by the 'Special Allowance for Garages' rule.

Qualifiers.applicability: Structure is located within the buildable area of the lot.
exclusions: Regulations for structures in the required yards (e.g., setbacks, height limits for yard structures) do not apply.

dimensional.name: number_of_stories
dimensional.description: Number of stories in the structure.

usage.name: project_type
usage.description: The nature of the construction project.

conditional_logic.then: Structure must be located within the buildable area.
Project is subject to the Planning Department's Individual Review (IR).

optional: Structure may be two stories high (implying one story is also permitted).

Exceptions.description: Structures under this rule do not have to comply with regulations for structures in the required yards.

Relationships.hierarchical: This rule is an alternative regulation for accessory structures under the general title 'Accessory structures site planning'.
logical_dependencies: The permission to be two stories high is dependent on the structure's location within the buildable area.
This rule set functions as an alternative to the 'Accessory Structure in Required Rear Yard' rule.

Qualifiers.applicability: Applies when a garage or parking structure is located in the rear/side yards on a lot that is not deep enough to maintain the 75' minimum distance from the front lot line.
exclusions: Does not apply to non-parking accessory structures.

dimensional.name: lot_depth_sufficiency
dimensional.description: Whether the lot is deep enough to maintain the 75' distance.

usage.name: structure_use
usage.description: The primary use of the accessory structure.

conditional_logic.if: structure_use IS 'parking' AND lot_depth_sufficiency IS false
conditional_logic.then: The 75' minimum distance requirement from the front lot line is waived.

Exceptions.description: Provides an exemption from the 75' minimum distance requirement for garages and parking structures.

Relationships.hierarchical: This is a special allowance that modifies a specific regulation for accessory structures.
logical_dependencies: This rule directly overrides the 'min_distance_from_front_lot_line' condition in the 'Accessory Structure in Required Rear Yard' rule for applicable structure types.
